title: The Cannabis Industry Is Not Created Equal
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: We know not all states have legal cannabis and taxes are still being spent to keep people in jail for cannabis charges - and while there is extreme wealth in the industry not enough is being done to create change. Stormy Simon - after a successful 15 years at Overstock.com - opened her eyes to the power of the cannabis plant - and after a stint as High Times' CEO - decided to run for Utah's House of Representatives. We discuss the importance of active participation, moving towards plant medicine, and disrupting the system with blockchain. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
